title: The Tail
description: Sick in bed, Amanda wakes from a delirious dream to discover she has a tail. Is she going mad? Is it the medicine she's taking? It sure feels real...and the tip is very sensitive...This is an intensely erotic and surreal short story about a woman struggling for control over impossible lusts. sexually explicit and even a little violent, this story is only for those not easily disturbed.
author: Robin C Corte
